name: Skyreach
description: Explore an ancient civilization lost in the clouds. Wind your way through floating mountains, hand carved columns, and relics of a time long passed. Collect crystals and time your play precisely to increase your score as you travel through the stunning environments of Skyreach.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.8GHz single core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: this game is VERY fun and has lots of potential BUT..... -there are so many bugs game isnt playable. -500 frames on mainmenu. 40 frames ingame -extremely bad steering. -building track causes death (occasionaly) after completing the first level i was posting a poz after completing the second level i was posting a neg

I would say my review is similar to others. The game is jittery and I have only really spent time playing during June so it is the current version available. The controls are iffy and trying to build the road is questionable there are times when it just won't let me build so I have to drive backward and forward until it recognizes my car is there. Which with a timed course does not work out.  The concept seemed interesting which is why I tried it but the overall execution fails.

It's a pretty bad game.  I believe its main issue centers around the core game mechanic, with you being a car and forced to construct the road before you, meaning you can only move a about a snail's pace which completely negates the purpose of driving a vehicle at all.  That combined with occasional physics bugs and a timer made this a boring experience, and I have no reservation in saying that it was a waste of time. I just couldn't care enough about the game to get frustrated with it.
Cool concept executed poorly. Skyreach is the dictionary definition of unoptimized, my 1070 has to run at 100% load.

this game is listed as needing: Processor: 1.8GHz single core  Memory: 2 GB RAM  Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+  Storage: 2 GB available space i have: Processor: 2.4GHz single core  Memory: 8 GB RAM  Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+  Storage: over 200 GB available space yet the game still cant run properly, and when i say properly, i mean at all!!!!
really bad game and really boring
I love this game! It's awesome! A cool gameplay, nice graphics and well optimized. Good job, guys! GG!
do not get this game it sucks balles
its great idea, great visuals but the controlls are really hard wish it was easier to play
